Articles.Content:
I present you the VTOL-Space Mk.V(I need a new name; suggestions open )

It's in 0.23.5 because I still haven't found either the time or the inclination to update everything Anyway: this can get to a 100 km circular orbit with about 1500m/s of deltav remaining. I have yet to test the performance with a payload.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
